name: SkyPeace
overview: Exhilarating and easy action! Soar away into the sky at full speed! SKYPEACE is a high-speed action game where you clear stages by carefully avoiding the enemies that appear. -Feel refreshed using simple maneuvers to get tons of coins! -Collect consecutive coins to trigger a combo, and string together combos to get a hi-score. -Also enjoy a different challenge by earning achievements through a variety of conditions ! -Enjoy exhilarating high-speed action unfolding in the air!
